episode_event_academy_ch0352_ch0101_ch01: Welcome to Pasio Academy!

Today, you’ll be joining us to see if you’d like to
enroll, correct?

Before we begin the tour, allow me to tell you
about the academy.

Pasio Academy was established thanks to the
cooperation of many people and Pokémon.

Its founding principle is to share the plentiful,
high-quality experiences and knowledge of those
here on Pasio.

I’m sure you’ll find many learning opportunities
here, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="Master" F="Miss" ] [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Oh? That must be...

[Name:PlayerNickname ], right? The one doing
a trial enrollment?
OK! Let’s go to school!

You go to Blueberry Academy, right? What kind of
school is it?

Well... First of all, it was built on the surface of
the ocean.
Whoa! The ocean?!

Yup! We also have an undersea facility called
the Terarium!

It contains artificial habitats that are easier for
Pokémon to live in!
Wow, I can’t even imagine.

This world’s full of things I’ve never even
heard of.

Hehehe! Then let’s have some fun studying it all
together!

Master Ilima, Miss Lacey. I appreciate that you’ve
arrived ahead of schedule.

Today, these two will be showing you around the
academy.

Master Ilima is a graduate of a Trainers’ School
in the Alola region.
He’s also the captain of Melemele Island.

Miss Lacey is a student at Blueberry
Academy in Unova.

Her skill and rank in her school’s BB League
has earned her a spot in their Elite Four.

These two are both model students here on Pasio
as well.

Thanks for having me today! I look forward to
getting to know you better!

I’ll support you any way I can so that your
academy experience is enjoyable!

Master Ilima, Miss Lacey, thank you again for
doing the academy tour.
Don’t mention it!

I hear [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s quite famous
here on Pasio...
so I was hoping for a chance to work with [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ]!

I’m honored to help spread the word and get
people excited about the academy.

It’s like a study abroad program where Trainers
from many regions can learn together!

I think it’s wonderful, what Pasio Academy is
trying to achieve!

I myself was able to expand my horizons by
studying abroad in Kalos.

So I think you too will view the world differently
after being here, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

Let’s get this show on the road and take a look
around campus, shall we?

I do hope you enjoy your time here,
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="Master" F="Miss" ] [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Off you go!

Students seem to like hanging out in this courtyard
here during breaks.
Everyone’s relaxing and having a good time!
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
So you joined the academy too, huh!
Um... Are you interested in their uniforms?
Ehehe! Aren’t they great?

You can wear your own clothes to school,
but they’ll give a uniform to anyone who
wants one!
You can wear it as is, like Rosa...
Or you can play around with it, like Rei did!

The school rules, including the dress code,
reflect the wishes of the students who helped
establish the academy.

Seeing what everyone wears to school is gonna
be SO much fun!

Being together in a group like this reminds me of
life in the Survey Corps back in the Hisui region.

I have to do my best so I can get a Full Star
rating on my schoolwork, too.

The Hisui region... That’s what Sinnoh was called
in the past, right?
I’ve heard about your situation, Rei.

Learning history from someone who experienced it
firsthand would be amazing!
You know, that IS true...

Also, that Pokémon of yours looks a little different
from the Braviary in Unova. Does that mean...
Yup! This Braviary is from Hisui.

Those fluffy feathers...and those eyelike markings...
They’re super cute!
Hear that, Braviary? You got a compliment!

Back in Hisui, we had Braviary that worked as
Ride Pokémon.

They helped me out from time to time by flying to
me while I was out surveying.
Oh, Ride Pokémon! Interesting!

Back in Alola, Ride Pokémon are a means of public
transportation.
Transportation, huh...

Maybe when I’m running late for school, I could
have Braviary fly me there.
Late for school? That’s just not right!

After that, [Name:PlayerNickname ] saw the
rest of the academy...
OK, I think we showed you everything!
Time for you to join a few classes!

They’re all interesting, so take as many as
you can!
If anything catches your eye, just jump right in!

We’ve shown you pretty much everything we
can for now...
We hope your studies go well!
Looks like you’ve all learned a lot!
Keep it up—and keep expanding your knowledge!
I’m quite relieved your time here was worthwhile.

However, Pasio Academy’s aim isn’t to produce
students who can get good grades.

This is a place where you can refine your
strengths and individuality...

all while fostering a deeper connection with
people and Pokémon.

Continue to support each other, to create a place
where knowledge can be shared.

That’s the type of school I hope Pasio Academy
becomes.

Thus, if you see a fellow student struggling,
do lend a helping hand.

Director Clavell, wasn’t 
[Name:PlayerNickname ] still on just a trial
enrollment?
Oh, goodness. That completely slipped my mind.

What do you think,
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="Master" F="Miss" ] [Name:PlayerNickname ]?

Would you like to officially enroll in
Pasio Academy?
Of course!
Thank you for the enthusiasm.
I’ll think about it.
Yes, of course.

There’s no need to rush. Please take your time to
think it over.

We plan to help Pasio Academy provide
high-quality education.
So when you join us here at the academy...
All of us will welcome you with open arms!
